sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-automations', templateUrl: './automations.component.html', styleUrls: ['./automations.component.scss'] }) export class AutomationsComponent { selectedTab = 'scenes'; scenes = [ { name: 'Morning Routine', description: 'Gradually wake up with lights, open blinds, start coffee maker', icon: 'wb_twilight', color: 'orange', active: true, schedule: '6:30 AM', devices: 5 }, { name: 'Good Night', description: 'Dim lights, lock doors, arm security system', icon: 'bedtime', color: 'indigo', active: false, schedule: '10:30 PM', devices: 8 }, { name: 'Movie Night', description: 'Dim living room lights, close blinds, set temperature', icon: 'movie', color: 'primary', active: false, schedule: 'Manual', devices: 3 }, { name: 'Away Mode', description: 'Turn off lights, arm security, adjust thermostat', icon: 'directions_walk', color: 'red', active: false, schedule: 'Geofence', devices: 12 } ]; automations = [ { name: 'Motion-Activated Lights', trigger: 'Motion detected', action: 'Turn on hallway lights', active: true, icon: 'sensors' }, { name: 'Temperature Control', trigger: 'Temperature > 75°F', action: 'Turn on AC', active: true, icon: 'thermostat' }, { name: 'Door Lock Alert', trigger: 'Front door unlocked', action: 'Send notification', active: false, icon: 'lock' } ]; selectTab(tab: string) { this.selectedTab = tab; } toggleScene(scene: any) { scene.active = !scene.active; } toggleAutomation(automation: any) { automation.active = !automation.active; } }
